plot: One morning, in busy peak hour traffic, two motorists lives collide in a near traffic accident. One driver chases another in a quest for revenge and eventually corners his fellow commuter. ...
title: Road Rage
plot_es: One morning, in busy peak hour traffic, two motorists lives collide in a near traffic accident. One driver chases another in a quest for revenge and eventually corners his fellow commuter. ...
plot_en: One morning, in busy peak hour traffic, two motorists lives collide in a near traffic accident. One driver chases another in a quest for revenge and eventually corners his fellow commuter. ...
